Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: In these social media posts people talk about a range of issues including criticism towards the Reserve Bank of Australia the promise of a responsible federal budget confusion around potential JobSeeker increases abortion funding and tax cuts in the Australian budget. There are also posts that highlight an interview with politician Bob Katter an argument against the implementation of stage 3 tax cuts and a post that simply suggests that there is an ever-widening divide between groups or individuals.
